previous.name: Incredible Things About the Wheel-Turning Monarch

segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 4
14. Puggalavagga
131. Saṃyojanasutta
“Cattārome, bhikkhave, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.

segments.pli: Katame cattāro?
Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni honti, upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni honti, bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni honti.
segments.en: One person hasn’t given up the lower fetters, the fetters for getting reborn, or the fetters for getting a continued existence.

segments.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni honti, upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni honti, bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni honti.
segments.en: One person has given up the lower fetters, but not the fetters for getting reborn, or the fetters for getting a continued existence.

segments.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni honti, upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni honti, bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni honti.
segments.en: One person has given up the lower fetters and the fetters for getting reborn, but not the fetters for getting a continued existence.

segments.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni honti, upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni honti, bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni honti.
segments.en: One person has given up the lower fetters, the fetters for getting reborn, and the fetters for getting a continued existence.

segments.pli: Katamassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni?
segments.en: What person hasn’t given up the lower fetters, the fetters for getting reborn, or the fetters for getting a continued existence?

segments.pli: Sakadāgāmissa.
Imassa kho, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni.
segments.en: This is the person who hasn’t given up the lower fetters, the fetters for getting reborn, or the fetters for getting a continued existence.

segments.pli: Katamassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni?
segments.en: What person has given up the lower fetters, but not the fetters for getting reborn, or the fetters for getting a continued existence?

segments.pli: Uddhaṃsotassa akaniṭṭhagāmino.
segments.en: One heading upstream, going to the Akaniṭṭha realm.

segments.pli: Imassa kho, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni.
Katamassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni?
segments.en: What person has given up the lower fetters and the fetters for getting reborn, but not the fetters for getting a continued existence?

segments.pli: Antarāparinibbāyissa.
segments.en: One extinguished between one life and the next.

segments.pli: Imassa kho, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni.
Katamassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni?
segments.en: What person has given up the lower fetters, the fetters for getting reborn, and the fetters for getting a continued existence?

segments.pli: Arahato.
Imassa kho, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni.
Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
segments.en: These are the four people found in the world.”

segments.pli: Paṭhamaṃ.
